sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Problem } from 'src/app/models/problem.model'; const DEFAULT_PROBLEM: Problem = Object.freeze({ id: 0, name: "", desc: "", difficulty: "Easy" }); @Component({ selector: 'app-new-problem', templateUrl: './new-problem.component.html', styleUrls: ['./new-problem.component.css'] }) export class NewProblemComponent { public difficulties = ["Easy", "Medium","Hard", "Super"]; newProblem: Problem = Object.assign({}, DEFAULT_PROBLEM); }
